Posts.EditableText:
Hi everyone,

Been a couple of years but I dusted Quest off the other day and remembered how much I liked creating with it.  That and I never did get around to bugfixxing that massive 2500kb file that was "Gathered in Darkness."  I have been thinking of porting it to another format but I thought I should at least finish what I've started.  Been away from it long enough that I'm actually excited about putting it back together.

Anyway,  hope you guys are great and maybe I can get this knocked out pretty quick.

Dr. Froth
